item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 24 Nov 2020
item.description:
1. OCaml User Survey 2020
  2. Suggestions from the OCaml Survey result
  3. OCaml for ARM MacOS
  4. TechEmpower benchmark: httpaf + lwt + unix on par with Haskell's warp
  5. Dropbox v2 API, and JSoO bindings for GridJS and IndexedDB
  6. OCaml in Jupyter-based Environments
  7. Ocurrent/opam Docker images have moved to ocaml/opam
  8. ocaml-lsp-server 1.2.0
  9. ca-certs and ca-certs-nss
  10. Compatibility packages for 4.12 (either, semaphore-compat)
  11. Jupyter with pyml
  12. OCaml needs an arbitrary-precision decimal type
  13. Type-at-point ocaml-lsp/merlin in vim/neovim
  14. ocamlearlybird now an OCaml Software Foundation supported project
  15. release of mc2 0.1, a SMT solver
  16. Wednesday, 25th November 2020 is MirageOS Bug Cleaning Day!
  17. Other OCaml News
